example.parse: (SBARQ (WHNP-1 (NOUN_QUANT أَيّ) (NP (NOUN بَلَد) (ADJ عَرَبِي))) (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3FS وَقَفِت) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (NP-CLR (NOUN مَعَ) (NP (POSS_PRON_2P كُم))) (NP-ADV (NOUN زَيّ) (NP (NP (NOUN_PROP مَصْر)) (CONJ وِ) (NP (NOUN شَعْب) (NP (NOUN_PROP مَصْر))))) (PP-PRP (PREP ل) (S-NOM (VP (NOUN.VN اِحساس) (NP-SBJ (POSS_PRON_1P نا)) (SBAR (SUB_CONJ إِنّ) (S (NP-SBJ (PRON_2P كُم)) (NP-PRD (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL إِخْوات) (NP (POSS_PRON_1P نا)))
